title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 15.1 - Industrial education
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 15.1 - Industrial education

State Regulations

The commissioner shall make regulations establishing
standards for the organization and conduct of industrial arts, vocational-industrial, technical, general industrial, part-time continuation, industrial cooperative, adult vocational-industrial and avocational-industrial
schools and classes. In approving such schools the commissioner shall determine
the adequacy of facilities and equipment, the standards of instruction and
their educational efficiency. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
15.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
